pullRequest.title: Disabled VSTRS optimizations for `inlineVectorizedStringIndexOf`
pullRequest.bodyText:
Compare and branch condition has been changed to greater than or equal
from greater than
This fix is based on @fjeremic's suggestion in #8159 (comment)
Fixes: #8159
Signed-off-by: Shubham Verma shubhamv.sv@gmail.com

Disabled VSTRS optimizations for `inlineVectorizedStringIndexOf`

Signed-off-by: Shubham Verma <shubhamv.sv@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Let's remove this change as we are disabling the optimization temporarily and we're not sure yet whether this is correct.

Please open up an issue to get this addressed and add a TODO here (referencing the issue number) so it doesn't slip past our radar:
// TODO (#????): Re-enable VSTRS support in inlineVectorizedStringIndexOf
